speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the debate on the report ( A6-0372/2006 ) by Mr Joan i Marí, on behalf of the Committee on Culture and Education, on a new framework strategy for multilingualism ( 2006/2083(INI) ).
original: President. – The next item is the debate on the report ( A6-0372/2006 ) by Mr Joan i Marí, on behalf of the Committee on Culture and Education, on a new framework strategy for multilingualism ( 2006/2083(INI) ).
agenda_item: A new framework strategy for multilingualism (debate)
